info.name: PropMatch API Collection v2.1 - Optimized Search
info.description:
**PropMatch Property Search API - Complete Collection v2.1**

ðŸš€ **Updated for Optimized Search with Precise Percentage Scoring**

PropMatch is an AI-powered property search platform that delivers precise property matches using advanced vector search and intelligent scoring.

## âš¡ New Features in v2.1
- **True Percentage Scores**: Realistic 0-100% match scores (85.3%, 92.7%, etc.)
- **Unique Decimal Precision**: No duplicate scores, every property gets unique rating
- **Optimized Performance**: Faster search with simplified scoring algorithms
- **High Scores for Good Matches**: Perfect matches can score 95-100%+
- **Objective Low Scores**: Poor matches get realistic low scores (20-30%)

## ðŸŽ¯ Scoring System Explained
- **Base Score**: Vector similarity (60-90%)
- **Bedroom Match**: +25% for exact match
- **Property Type**: +20% for type match
- **Price Range**: +15% for budget compliance
- **Location**: +15% for area match
- **Features**: +2% per matching feature
- **Final Range**: 15-100%+ (capped at 100%)

## ðŸ” Natural Language Examples
- "3 bedroom house with garden" â†’ 83-87% scores
- "luxury apartment in Clifton" â†’ 95-100% scores
- "castle with moat" â†’ 26-28% scores (realistic low)

## Base URL
`http://localhost:8000`

item.name: ðŸŸ¢ Health & Status Checks
item.description: Verify all services are running and healthy

request.description:
**Basic API Health Check**

âœ… Verifies PropMatch API server is running

**Expected Response:**
```json
{
  "message": "PropMatch API is running!",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "docs": "/docs"
}
```

**Use Case:** Quick server availability check

**Browse All Properties with Pagination**

ðŸ“‹ Get paginated list of all available properties

**Query Parameters:**
- `skip`: Offset for pagination (default: 0)
- `limit`: Number of properties (max: 100, default: 20)

**Response Data:**
- Complete property details
- High-resolution images
- Features and amenities
- Points of interest with distances
- Property specifications

**Use Case:** Property browsing without search filters

**Traditional Property Filtering**

ðŸ”§ Filter properties using dropdown-style parameters

**Available Filters:**
- `property_type`: apartment, house, townhouse
- `min_price`/`max_price`: Price range in ZAR
- `bedrooms`: Number of bedrooms
- `city`: Filter by city
- `suburb`: Filter by neighborhood

**Use Case:** When users prefer structured filters over natural language

**Individual Property Details**

ðŸ  Get complete details for a specific property

**Path Parameter:**
- `property_id`: Property listing number (e.g., 116045887)

**Complete Data Includes:**
- Full property description
- All images and virtual tours
- Detailed features and amenities
- Exact location information
- Points of interest with distances
- Property specifications (floor size, erf size)
- Rates and taxes information

**Use Case:** Property detail page after search selection

**Property Database Statistics**

ðŸ“Š Overview of property database contents

**Statistics Include:**
- Total properties (1,438)
- Properties for sale vs. rent
- Property type distribution
- Price range (min: R320k, max: R180M, avg: R5.1M)
- Top cities by property count

**Expected Response:**
```json
{
  "total_properties": 1438,
  "for_sale": 1000,
  "property_types": [
    {"type": "house", "count": 450},
    {"type": "apartment", "count": 549}
  ],
  "price_range": {
    "min": 320000,
    "max": 180000000,
    "average": 5067399
  }
}
```

**Use Case:** Dashboard widgets and market analysis

item.name: ðŸ¤– AI-Powered Search (Main Feature)
item.description: Natural language property search with precise scoring

request.description:
**Perfect Match Example - High Scores Expected**

ðŸŽ¯ **Expected Scores: 83-87%**

This query should find excellent matches because:
- âœ… "3 bedroom" = +25% bonus for exact bedroom match
- âœ… "house" = +20% bonus for property type match
- âœ… "garden" = +2% bonus for feature match
- âœ… Strong vector similarity for common request

**Query Analysis:**
- **Bedrooms**: 3 (extracted automatically)
- **Property Type**: House (intelligent recognition)
- **Features**: Garden (feature matching)

**Expected Results:**
- Properties with exactly 3 bedrooms
- Houses (not apartments)
- Properties with gardens/outdoor space
- Scores in 80-90% range for good matches

**Test Goal:** Verify high scores for good matches

**Luxury Property Search - Expect 95-100%+ Scores**

ðŸ† **Expected Scores: 95-100%+**

This should get the highest scores because:
- âœ… "apartment" = +20% type bonus
- âœ… "Clifton" = +15% location bonus (premium area)
- âœ… "view" = +2% feature bonus
- âœ… High vector similarity for luxury properties
- âœ… Premium properties match luxury context

**Query Analysis:**
- **Property Type**: Apartment
- **Location**: Clifton (premium Atlantic Seaboard)
- **Features**: Sea view
- **Context**: Luxury (high-end properties)

**Expected Results:**
- Expensive apartments in Clifton
- Properties with sea/ocean views
- High-end finishes and amenities
- Scores approaching or exceeding 100%

**Test Goal:** Verify perfect matches get highest scores

**Budget-Conscious Search with Price Filter**

ðŸ’° **Expected Scores: 75-90%** (depending on price compliance)

**Automatic Filter Extraction:**
- âœ… "2 bedroom" â†’ bedrooms = 2 (+25% bonus)
- âœ… "apartment" â†’ type = apartment (+20% bonus)
- âœ… "under 2 million" â†’ max_price = 2,000,000 (+15% bonus)

**AI Intelligence:**
- Understands "under 2 million rand" as price constraint
- Converts to R2,000,000 automatically
- Prioritizes properties within budget
- Penalizes overpriced properties

**Expected Results:**
- 2-bedroom apartments only
- All properties under R2,000,000
- Higher scores for properties well under budget
- Properties close to R2M may score lower

**Test Goal:** Verify price filter extraction and application

**Family-Oriented Search - Context Understanding**

ðŸ« **Expected Scores: 70-85%**

**AI Context Understanding:**
- "family home" = house preference (not apartment)
- "good schools" = proximity to education facilities
- "southern suburbs" = specific Cape Town area

**Scoring Factors:**
- âœ… Houses score higher than apartments
- âœ… "southern suburbs" location bonus (+15%)
- âœ… Properties with school POIs get higher scores
- âœ… Family-suitable sizes (3+ bedrooms)

**Expected Areas:**
- Newlands, Claremont, Rondebosch
- Wynberg, Plumstead, Constantia
- Areas known for good schools

**Test Goal:** Verify contextual understanding and location scoring

**Feature-Specific Search - Multiple Amenities**

ðŸš— **Expected Scores: 65-80%** (varies by feature matches)

**Feature Matching:**
- âœ… "pool" = +2% per property with pool
- âœ… "garage" = +2% per property with garage/parking
- âœ… "security" = +2% per property with security features
- ðŸŽ¯ Perfect match = +6% total feature bonus

**AI Feature Recognition:**
- Matches against property.features array
- Flexible matching ("pool" matches "swimming pool")
- Cumulative scoring for multiple features

**Expected Results:**
- Properties with swimming pools
- Properties with garages or covered parking
- Secure complexes or gated communities
- Higher scores for properties with all 3 features

**Test Goal:** Verify feature detection and cumulative scoring

**Impossible Query - Testing Objective Low Scores**

âŒ **Expected Scores: 20-30%** (realistic low scores)

**Purpose of This Test:**
- Verify AI doesn't artificially inflate scores
- Confirm objective scoring for impossible requests
- Test that poor matches get appropriately low scores

**Why Scores Should Be Low:**
- No properties match "castle"
- No "moat" or "drawbridge" features exist
- Vector similarity will be very low
- No bonus points can be awarded

**Expected Behavior:**
- Returns some properties (vector search finds closest matches)
- All scores in 20-35% range
- Properties returned are random houses/apartments
- No artificial score boosting

**Test Goal:** Verify realistic low scores for poor matches

**Location-Specific Search - Multiple Areas**

ðŸ“ **Expected Scores: 70-85%**

**Location Intelligence:**
- âœ… "Newlands" and "Rondebosch" = +15% location bonus
- âœ… "apartment" = +20% type bonus
- âœ… "near UCT" = proximity scoring boost
- âœ… University areas = good POI coverage

**AI Understanding:**
- Recognizes multiple location options
- Understands UCT (University of Cape Town) context
- Prioritizes properties in specified neighborhoods
- Applies proximity scoring for university area

**Expected Results:**
- Apartments in Newlands and Rondebosch primarily
- Properties close to UCT campus
- Student-friendly areas
- Good transport links to university

**Test Goal:** Verify multi-location recognition and proximity scoring

item.name: ðŸ”¬ Testing & Debug Tools
item.description: Tools for testing and debugging search functionality

request.description:
**Simple Search - Quick Testing Format**

ðŸ”¬ Simplified endpoint for rapid testing

**Features:**
- Lighter response format
- Essential property info only
- Quick debugging
- Same AI search power

**Response Format:**
```json
{
  "query": "modern apartment with parking",
  "found": 15,
  "ai_powered": true,
  "properties": [
    {
      "id": "116045887",
      "title": "Modern Apartment...",
      "price": 2500000,
      "location": "Clifton, Cape Town",
      "searchScore": 87.3,
      "url": "https://..."
    }
  ]
}
```

**Use Case:** Quick integration testing and debugging

**Vector Search Debug - Raw Similarity Scores**

ðŸ” Debug endpoint showing raw vector search mechanics

**Debug Information:**
- Raw vector similarity scores (0.6-0.9 range)
- Property metadata from vector database
- Index statistics and health
- Detailed scoring breakdown

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "status": "success",
  "query": "luxury house with view",
  "results": [
    {
      "property_id": "116045887",
      "vector_score": 0.8234,
      "metadata": {
        "property_type": "house",
        "price": 15000000,
        "bedrooms": 4,
        "city": "Cape Town"
      }
    }
  ],
  "index_stats": {
    "total_vectors": 1437,
    "dimension": 1536
  }
}
```

**Use Case:** Understanding vector search behavior and debugging similarity scoring

item.name: ðŸ“Š Scoring System Tests
item.description: Test specific aspects of the new scoring system

request.description:
**Bedroom Matching Test - +25% Bonus Verification**

ðŸŽ¯ **Test Goal:** Verify exact bedroom matches get +25% bonus

**Expected Behavior:**
- Properties with exactly 4 bedrooms should score highest
- Properties with 3 or 5 bedrooms should score +15% (close match)
- Properties with 2 or 6 bedrooms should score +6% (somewhat close)
- Properties with 1 or 7+ bedrooms get no bedroom bonus

**Score Expectations:**
- 4-bedroom properties: 80-90%+
- 3/5-bedroom properties: 75-85%
- Other bedroom counts: 65-75%

**Verification Steps:**
1. Check all top results have 4 bedrooms
2. Verify scores decrease for non-exact matches
3. Confirm scoring follows proximity pattern

**Property Type Precision Test - +20% Bonus**

ðŸ  **Test Goal:** Verify property type matching accuracy

**Expected Behavior:**
- All results should be apartments (not houses)
- Apartments should get +20% type bonus
- "balcony" should provide +2% feature bonus
- Combined bonuses should yield high scores

**Score Expectations:**
- Apartments with balconies: 85-95%
- Apartments without balconies: 80-90%
- Any houses should score much lower

**Quality Checks:**
1. Verify all results are type="apartment"
2. Check for balcony feature in high-scoring properties
3. Confirm no houses in top results

**Price Range Compliance Test - +15% Budget Bonus**

ðŸ’Ž **Test Goal:** Verify price filter extraction and bonus application

**AI Price Intelligence:**
- "under 3 million rand" â†’ max_price = 3,000,000
- Properties â‰¤ R3M should get +15% bonus
- Properties â‰¤ R3.6M (20% over) should get +8% bonus
- Properties > R3.6M should get no price bonus

**Expected Results:**
- All properties should be under R3.6M
- Cheapest properties (well under budget) score highest
- Properties near R3M score moderately
- No properties over R3.6M in results

**Score Pattern:**
- R1-2M properties: 85-95% (excellent value)
- R2.5-3M properties: 80-90% (within budget)
- R3-3.6M properties: 75-85% (acceptable)

**Unique Score Verification - No Duplicates**

ðŸ”„ **Test Goal:** Confirm every property gets a unique decimal score

**Uniqueness Features:**
- Each property gets consistent random factor (0.01-0.99)
- Decimal precision to 1 place (e.g., 87.3%)
- Deterministic per property (same property = same score)
- No two properties should have identical scores

**Verification Checklist:**
1. âœ… All scores are unique (no duplicates)
2. âœ… Scores have 1 decimal place
3. âœ… Scores range appropriately (not all similar)
4. âœ… Running same query gives consistent scores

**Expected Pattern:**
- 15 properties = 15 unique scores
- Example: 78.3%, 76.7%, 74.1%, 72.8%, etc.
- Proper ranking order maintained
- Realistic score distribution

pm.test("Search scores are realistic percentages", function () {
pm.test("Search scores are unique (no duplicates)", function () {
